title: IndexZero
description: Web app that visualizes the data structures with a mobile first approach.

title: LaborLytics Mobile App
description: A mobile application that provides hospitals with real-time dashboards and KPI insights.

title: LaborLytics 2.0
description: A data-driven local web app created as the next version of LaborLytics, designed to help healthcare professionals manage their day-to-day work.

title: Tenant Management
description: A web application used as an internal tool to manage hospital functionality and access for the LaborLytics Mobile App.
